alert.note: Alert for Clay; Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 10 at 10:46AM CDT until April 10 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Wyandotte County in northeastern Kansas... Southwestern Clay County in west central Missouri... Southeastern Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1046 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Houston Lake, or over Riverside, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Kansas City, Liberty, Gladstone, Parkville, North Kansas City, Riverside, Weatherby Lake, Claycomo, Pleasant Valley, Lake Waukomis, Avondale, Platte Woods, Oakview, Northmoor, Houston Lake, Oakwood Park, Oakwood, Birmingham, Oaks and Randolph. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 5 and 14. Interstate 29 between mile markers 0 and 8. Interstate 635 between mile markers 6 and 12. Interstate 435 between mile markers 45 and 55. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
